name: Beautiful Princess, Nabe
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phrase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I serve and obey.

name: Hero of Heroes, Momon
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The Curtains Rise on a Legend" is in your climax area, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Humanoid Race》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: I happen to be the only adventurer in town strong enough to rescue your grandson.

name: Entomancer, Entoma
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets 《Bug》 and -1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Blade bug!

name: Nazarick's Maid Intern, Tuare
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I wish to stay with Lord Sebas.

name: Commending Humans, Momon
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: They’re really quite good.

name: Tuare's Rescue Operation, Sebas
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Butler of Steel" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, return it to his or her hand, choose up to 1 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Nazarick's Values, Nabe
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 4 or higher, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has.
flavorText: Complete garbage.

name: Demon King, Jaldabaoth
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 of your opponent's level X or lower characters, and put it into his or her waiting room. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Operation Gehenna" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until the end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I assumed they were at least as strong as you.

name: Infiltration of the Capital, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and return it to his or her hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: What makes you think I owe a human any kind of explanation?

name: Undefeated Warrior, Momon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +2 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Now then.

name: Ingenious Demon, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character or this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)
flavorText: It appears we now have one more Eight Fingers base to attack tonight.

name: Cold Reaction, Nabe
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: If you say so, Lord.

name: Details of Operation Gehenna, Demiurge
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest on the top of your deck in any order, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When "Operation Gehenna" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Demon King, Jaldabaoth" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: With that narrative in place, Jaldabaoth has attacked the Eight Fingers bases looking for this item. Which just happened to give him control of the capital’s warehouse district.

name: Where Happiness Is, Tuare
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Embodiment of Justice, Sebas" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on as the defending character.
flavorText: That tickled my chin.

name: Dissolution Vessel, Solution
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's marker area, and put it into his or her waiting room. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So, I thought. I’d let him have a taste.

name: Djungarian Hamster? Hamusuke
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I am! Tell me stranger, how is it that you came to know of my species?

name: Bug-Loving Maid, Entoma
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: She looks tasty on top of filling, so I guess I’ll spoil myself just this once.

name: Embodiment of Justice, Sebas
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have "Where Happiness Is, Tuare" in your waiting room, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: I have a few complaints that need to be addressed personally.

name: Stupefied, Nabe
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.

name: Subjugation of the Wise King of the Forest, Momon
text: 【CONT】 If the card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +3000 power and +1 soul. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous position as 【REST】)

name: Kiss of Happiness
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Wise King of the Forest
text: If you do not have a 《Raven Black》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose up to 2 characters in your opponent's center stage, and return them to his or her hand.
flavorText: Hamusuke: "Hohoh"

name: The Curtains Rise on a Legend
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: We need to make a path. And I think I know what will do the trick.

name: Operation Gehenna
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText: Momon: "Uooooh!!"

name: Butler of Steel
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: Master of Great Tomb of Nazarick, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest of the cards into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: First, I shall express my gratitude to you for assisting in my experiment.

name: Unreliable Nature Manipulator, Mare
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 1 or higher character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: You’re a leader who’s kind as well as merciful.

name: Boundless Obsessive Love, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Benevolent Pure White Demon" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It would be my pleasure to serve you.

name: Energetic Beast Tamer, Aura
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: We’re done here!

name: Emotion Inhibition, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 2 characters in your opponent's center stage, and those characters get -500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I miss bickering like this! Hahaha!

name: Protector of the Treasury, Pandora's Actor
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is , you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Greetings to my creator, Lord Momonga!

name: Death Knight
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Overlord, Ainz", this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Uoooooooaaaaaah!!

name: A Woman's Battle, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "A Woman's Nature" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3000 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -2 soul until end of turn."
flavorText: I will rush to his side! No matter what I have to sacrifice!

name: Remains of a Dark Past, Pandora's Actor
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 character in your hand with level equal to or lower than your level, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Das ist meines Gottes Wille!

name: Precious Watch, Aura
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Floor Guardian Twins" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Bukubukuchagama: "Lunch time! Take a break!"

name: A Ring of Reward, Mare
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put that card into your stock. (Otherwise, return that card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I will be sure to work extra, extra hard for you and the honor of Nazarick, I swear it!

name: Allure of Position of Uncle, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] {When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: What a magnificent scene.

name: Ecstatic Respect and Affection, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Overlord, Ainz" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Overlord, Ainz" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: And when all of the others had left us behind. He mercifully stayed with us.

name: Absolute Loyalty, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: Everyone in this world will know of your greatness, and fear your undying wrath.

name: Elder Sister of the Battle Maids, Yuri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +4500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from hand." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: I agree with Albedo on this, Sir.

name: Assault Maid, CZ2128・Δ
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power and 《Sticker》 until end of turn.
flavorText: I’ll cover you.

name: Command Mantra, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "As a Warrior, Cocytus" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"As a Warrior, Cocytus" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "As a Warrior, Cocytus" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Do try to enjoy your last few hours, okay?

name: Sadist with a Smile, Lupusregina
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I actually get along pretty well with them, too.

name: Financial Management, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Dammit all. Why is there never enough money?

name: Oval Battle Maid, Narberal
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: I don’t know, she’s a rodent. Why would I care what other rodents call her?

name: As a Warrior, Cocytus
flavorText: Demiurge: "We could have sent in minions in case this is a trap. If all the Guardians fought together, there isn’t a force that could overtake us."

name: Freezing Spell
text: 【COUNTER】 Brainstorm Flip over the top 2 cards of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose 1 of your opponent's characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player."

name: Benevolent Pure White Demon
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: My lord. We, the Guardians. pledge our fidelity.

name: A Woman's Nature
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Floor Guardian Twins
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Mare: "I apologize for making you wait, Lord Momonga."

name: Crimson Red Battle Maiden, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Aah… My Lord…!!

name: Infinite Loyalty, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: Lord Ainz…

name: Overlord, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Return this card to your hand] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "〈Grasp Heart〉" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character on the top of your opponent's deck, choose 1 "Death Knight" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Well, I’m here now. You’ll help me test my power whether you want to or not.

name: Strongest Magic Caster, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Shooting Star" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "〈Fallen Down〉" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: The Goal of All Life is Death!

name: Defender of the Throne, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Is everything all right?

name: Cute Blunder, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Overlord, Ainz" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Overlord, Ainz" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your "Overlord, Ainz", and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ah!!

name: Ability of a Floor Guardian, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Ability of a Floor Guardian, Shalltear", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Pipette Lance" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, choose up to 3 cards in your clock, and put them into your waiting room."
flavorText: I love watching you try to play tough. It is absolutely adorable.

name: 8th Floor Guardian, Victim
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I will take my leave and return to my duties in the Great Tomb.

name: Vampire Bride
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Shalltear: "Our unfortunate prey finally took a bite of the bait?"

name: Reason for the Handicap, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I guess there’s no point hiding it.

name: A Woman's Battle, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent's stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: The supreme beings made me what I am.

name: True Vampire Ancestor, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Vampire Bride" from your waiting room into your clock] This ability can be used up to 3 times per turn. Draw 1 card.
flavorText: My, my. It appears I’m the first to arrive.

name: 4th Floor Guardian, Gargantua
text: 【CONT】 This card gets -2 level while on the stage. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters.

name: Leader of Pleiades, Sebas
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: By your command, my lord.

name: Assistant Butler, Eclair
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's clock, and put it into his or her waiting room. If you do, your opponent puts the top card of your opponent's deck into his or her clock. 【AUTO】 When you refresh your deck, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: Lord Sebas is away on business, so I must work twice as hard to make up for him.

name: Nature of a Floor Guardian, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul for each in the trigger icon of the card put into your waiting room until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: I will personally make sure these fools regret their folly.

name: True Power, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters.
flavorText: Haaa!!

name: Crazed Bloodlust, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Maaaaaain dissssssh!

name: Resurrection Ritual, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Shalltear's Resurrection" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.
flavorText: I’m sorry, Shalltear. This was all because of my mistake.

name: Diversionary Tactics, Sebas
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I’d like to see the spell and cantrips list, if you please.

name: Shooting Star
text: Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) "Choose up to 2 cards in your clock, and put them into your waiting room. Put this card into your memory." "Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +8000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn."
flavorText: Shooting Star! Now, ring. I command you!

name: 〈Fallen Down〉
text: If you have a card in your memory, you cannot play this card from your hand. Put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of your draw phase, if this card is in your memory, put the top card of your deck face down into your memory. If you have 4 or more face down cards in your memory, put all cards from your memory into your waiting room. If you put 5 or more cards into your waiting room, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Here I come, Shalltear!

name: 〈Grasp Heart〉
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Shalltear's Resurrection
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Ainz: "All that’s left is to begin Shalltear’s resurrection."

name: Pipette Lance
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Ainz: "Gaah!!"

name: "Blue Rose" Evileye
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "5th Tier Magic Caster" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "If you have another blue or 《Raven Black》 character, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to your opponent's deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck." "Choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. If you put 2 cards into your waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax in your opponent's waiting room." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: This one is stronger than you two. That said. I’m stronger than her.

name: The Golden Princess, Renner
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 blue or 《Raven Black》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Let’s see. Which face am I supposed to wear, again?

name: A Maiden's Heart, Evileye
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your blue or 《Raven Black》 characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event, or a blue or 《Raven Black》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Not at all. That’s just the kind of man he is.

name: White-Scaled Beauty, Crusch
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During your turn, when you play an event, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavorText: Zaryusu: "I refuse to let the female I love die like that."

name: "Blue Rose" Lakyus
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other blue or 《Raven Black》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 blue or 《Raven Black》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Always happy to have you along.

name: Honorable Warrior, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 4 or higher, this card gets +1000 power for each of your opponent's characters at 【REST】. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Subhuman Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Ruler of the Frozen Lake" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Normally, I would face you with a weapon in each hand…

name: A New Legend, Momon
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters. That character does not 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your 【STAND】 characters] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, put 3 cards from the bottom of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room. If there are no climax among those cards, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Pathetic.

name: Battle to Protect a Kingdom, Momon
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a card with in its trigger icon, if "Raven Black Hero" is in your climax area, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 blue or 《Raven Black》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Frost Pain Modified!

name: Grotesque Hydra, Rororo
text: 【CONT】 If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Strongest Lizardman Warrior, Zaryusu" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Iguva: "Insufferable brute!"

name: Strongest Lizardman Warrior, Zaryusu
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +500 power for each of your opponent's characters at 【REST】. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Frost Pain" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Bad move. Now there’s no way I’ll lose.

name: Invisibility Magic, Evileye
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your blue or 《Raven Black》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: I've returned.

name: Kingdom's Head Warrior, Gazef
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other blue or 《Raven Black》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Run ‘em through!

name: "Blue Rose" Tina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 during battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: What now, evil boss?

name: Extreme Love, Renner
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Struggles of the Untalented, Climb" get +1500 power and the following 3 abilities. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects or become 【REVERSE】 by your opponent's 【AUTO】 effects." "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play event or "Backup" from their hand." "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory."
flavorText: Renner: I’ll kill her. Just like the rest.

name: "Blue Rose" Tia
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 ""Blue Rose" Tia", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: It devours the vocal chords of its human victims and perfectly imitates their voice.

name: "Green Claw" Cheftian Shasuryu
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: That’s a damn shame, isn’t it?

name: Struggles of the Untalented, Climb
flavorText: Gazef: "But while he’s limited by his ability, he’s not limited by experience."

name: Brain
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may declare the name of this card.
flavorText: My name is Brain Unglaus.

name: "Blue Rose" Gagaran
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of blue or 《Raven Black》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: This is bad. I don’t think we have the slightest chance of winning.

name: Berserker with a Giant Fist, Zenberu
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of cards in your level is 3 or higher, this card gets +1000 power for each of your opponent's characters at 【REST】.
flavorText: Martial Art. Iron Natural Weapon.

name: Frost Pain
text: Choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters. That character does not 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: You’re finished!

name: Adamantite-Class Adventurer
text: 【COUNTER】 If you have 4 or more blue or 《Raven Black》 characters, choose 1 《Blue Rose》 character in your clock, and return it to your hand. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Do you actually believe he’s the same level as the strongest adventurers in the world?

name: 5th Tier Magic Caster
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Introductions? How courteous of you.

name: Raven Black Hero
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Ruler of the Frozen Lake
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Nazarick's Loyal Retainer, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: I can only repay you, by humbly offering an even deeper devotion to your will.

name: Unique Speech Mannerisms, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power and +1 soul until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: You know what, I am not even mad about it. Not one little bit!

name: To the Most Beloved One, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Welcome home, Lord Ainz.

name: Supreme in a Weapons Battle, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
flavorText: I admit they were weak. But I also cannot deny they possessed the brilliance of true warriors.

name: Bashful Effeminate Boy, Mare
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Your ring. Thanks again.

name: Breath of Mental Manipulation, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: So stupid. What kind of Vampire let’s herself get mind controlled?

name: Joyful Exclamation, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Hehehehe…

name: 6th Floor Guardian, Mare
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "6th Floor Guardian, Aura", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I’m hurrying!

name: 6th Floor Guardian, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Hah!

name: Scheming Demon, Demiurge
text: 【AUTO】 When your character direct attacks, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over the top 4 cards of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: Truly outstanding!

name: Lunchtime, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: Get in my belly!

name: Innocent Insult, Mare
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I’m trying to find the most important person in the mansion. Is that you, lady?

name: Butler of Great Tomb of Nazarick, Sebas
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock]".
flavorText: Lord.

name: 7th Floor Guardian, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to the level of that character ×500. 【CONT】 If you are level 3 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Ruler of Death, Ainz" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on."
flavorText: The guardian of the seventh floor. Demiurge. I serve and obey.

name: 5th Floor Guardian, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, you may choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Endless Devotion, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card direct attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Supreme one we await your orders. You need but to ask it of us and it shall be done.

name: Loyalty Ritual
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Albedo: "The leader of the guardians. Albedo. I serve and obey."

name: The End and the Beginning, Momonga
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "The End and the Beginning, Albedo" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"The End and the Beginning, Albedo" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The End and the Beginning, Albedo" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: The command was. “Stand By”, right?

name: Overseer of Floor Guardians, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Hehehe

name: 1st to 3rd Floor Guardian, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Benevolent Overlord, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: And I love all of you for that.

name: The End and the Beginning, Albedo
flavorText: I realize my failure to assist you is inexcusable. I don’t deserve it, but I beg for your mercy, lord.

name: Crimson Red Tyrant, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText:
My name is Shalltear Bloodfallen.
I hope you will entertain me well before you perish.

name: Ruler of Death, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "7th Floor Guardian, Demiurge", look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 "The Curtain Closes" in your climax area and 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put all level 3 or lower characters in your opponent's center stage into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: I will spread the name of Ainz Ooal Gown to every corner of this strange new world.

name: Ring of Ainz Ooal Gown
text: Choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Now, take this ring and serve Nazarick well.

name: The Curtain Closes
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Ainz: "Here I come, Shalltear!"

name: Staff of Ainz Ooal Gown
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Let’s go. You’re a testament of our guild.
